I can suggest some measures that can help ensure that your eye exercises are effective and help improve your eye health:

1. practice eye exercises regularly: consistency is key when it comes to eye exercises. practice eye exercises regularly to see a noticeable improvement in your eye health.

2. monitor your progress: keep track of how you feel before and after eye exercises. over time, you may notice that your eyes feel less strained or tired, which can indicate an improvement in eye health.

3. consider professional guidance: consult an eye care professional to ensure that the eye exercises you are doing are appropriate for your eye condition.

4. maintain a healthy lifestyle: maintaining a healthy lifestyle can help support and complement the effects of eye exercises. this includes getting adequate sleep, maintaining a healthy diet, and avoiding smoking.

5. get regular eye check-ups: regular eye check-ups can help you monitor your eye health and ensure that your eye exercises are effective.

in conclusion, practicing eye exercises regularly, monitoring your progress, seeking professional guidance, maintaining a healthy lifestyle, and getting regular eye check-ups can help you ensure that your eye exercises are effective in improving your eye health.
